Human VS AI

Build a Mobile App with Vue.js, ML Kit, and NativeScript

Jen Looper, Progress and Founder & CEO of Vue Vixens

WHAT is machine learning

  • Coursera course by Andrew Ng (what started Coursera)

How to make a machine learn (supervised learning)

  1. Gather data
    • Training set
    • Test set
  2. Catagorize training set (give data labels)
    • MechanicalTurk
  3. Run test

How to make a machine learn (unsupervised learning)

  1. Gather data
    • Training set
    • Test set
  2. A self-teaching pattern-recognizing algorithm
  3. Run test

How to make a machine learn (reinforcement learning)

  1. Gather data
    • Training set
    • Test set
  2. A curious self-taching pattern-recognizing algorithm
    • Increase difficulty
  3. Run test

Tools

  • TensorFlow
    • Intro to TF with CodeLabs
  • TensorFlow.js
    • TF for browser and Node.js

ML in the wild

  • StitchFix = ML + human curation
    • Recommendation engine
      • Location
      • Trends
      • Season
  • Scary: Surveillance cameras and identification
    • Monitor group emotions
    • Track location
  • Good
    • MIT kids optimize school bus routes
    • Seeing AI (read US money for blind people)
    • Facebook Marketplace: suggesting price for item
    • Spotify: daily mixes
    • Google Translate

DIY machine learning is hard

  • Tough to get good quality data
  • Lots of compute
  • Lots of skillz

Make it easy

  • Clarifai (image recognition)
  • Google Cloud Platform
  • On your device with a plugin…
    • Offline
    • Custom training
    • TensorFlow! (well, TensorFlow Lite) => ML Kit

ML Kit

  • Data through Firebase
  • Google Cloud VIsion API
  • Pre-trained model

DEMO with Vue and NativeScript

Tools

  • ML Kit
  • Firebase
  • Vue
  • Vuex (like Redux)

Process

  1. Why Vue for NativeScript?
    • Vue 2.0 adoption of the virutal DOM enables native mobile rendering (like Angular 2+)
    • Lightweight
  2. NativeScript Vue playground
  3. Image recognition: Labradoodle VS Fried Chicken
  4. Scaffold Vue app with CLI
  5. Vuex to keep score
